title: This 847 sq ft 1 bed, 1 bath is impressive!
posting_body: ['Come and see what the fuss is all about at Lofts at Farmers Market, located at 260 5th St E St. Paul, MN 55101.', 'Description', '........', 'Life can get busy and stressful, and this is precisely why the place that you call home is so important.', 'When you have a quiet, safe, and beautiful place to put your feet up at the end of a long day, it makes facing tomorrow that much easier.', 'The Lofts at Farmers Market strives to create a peaceful oasis in the heart of Saint Paul, Minnesota where you can relax, refresh, and rejuvenate.', "Lofts at Farmers Market offers studio, one, and two bedroom floor plans that are elegantly designed with the modern conveniences that you're searching for.", 'Each unit comes with spectacular high ceilings, modern stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, cozy kitchen islands with sleek granite counters, and a full-sized washer and dryer.', 'Our community amenities also make the Lofts an exceptional place to live.', 'Work out in our 24-hour fitness center and enjoy the views from our green rooftop terrace complete with fire pit and grill.', 'Before work, be sure to stop by our coffee bar to help start the day off right.', "We're also a pet-friendly community, welcoming cats and certain dog breeds.", 'We even have an on-site pet washing station to keep your furry friend looking and smelling great!', 'Another feature that makes the Lofts stand out in the crowd is our prime location.', "You'll find us in the Historic Lowertown neighborhood across from the Farmer's Market and CHS Field, plus the Union Depot Light Rail Station is just 1.5 blocks away!", "Transportation is a breeze with I-94, I-35E, Hwy 5, and US 52 nearby, but you won't have to travel far to find great destinations.", "Mears Park is just across the street and it's a great place to go for a walk, have a picnic, or enjoy one of the many community events including the Twin Cities Jazz Festival and Music in Mears summertime concerts.", "There are also plenty of restaurants, shops, and entertainment venues close by, so you'll never get bored living at the Lofts!", 'For a spectacular move-in ready Saint Paul, MN apartment to rent, come and visit us at the Lofts at Farmers Market!', 'Like all Weidner Apartment Homes, we pride ourselves on our unparalleled customer service and the pristine care with which we manage our communities.', 'Contact us today to learn about apartment availability, lease agreements, or to schedule a tour.', 'Come and find out what makes the Lofts so special!', 'show contact info',
